metadata.title: CVE-2022-24947 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Apache JSPWiki user preferences form is vulnerable to CSRF attacks, whichcan lead to account takeover. Apache JSPWiki users should upgrade to 2.11.2or later.

criterions.comment: jspwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
